Articles.Content:
This thread is for all the poetry lovers of this forum.

You may post poems that are not related to KSP, and criticize the poems of others.

But, be sure to not develop a flame war.

To start it all, I'll post a poem of my own.

As I lay down on my bed, I think.

Thinking of all the things I will do.

But I'm unsure of what to do.

So I lay down on my bed and think more.
